lines: TELL ME THE STORY OF JESUS
1. Ndzi Byele Hungu Ra Yesu,Tsala Mbilwin Yanga, Hungu Ro Saseka Ngopfu,Ku Tlurisa Hinkwawo;
Tintsumi Ti Yimbelela, Ti Amukela Hosi,
A Ku Dzuniwe Xikwembu, Ku Rhula Misaveni.
Ndzi Byele Hungu Ra Yesu, Tsala Mbilwini Yanga; Hungu Ro Saseka Ngopfu, Ku Tlurisa Hinkwawo.
2. A Titsona Ni Swakudya, A Tshamile Mananga, Hikokwalaho Ka Mina, Na Swidyoho Swa Mina,
Yesu A Hlula Miringo, Maxangu Ni Nhlomulo, A Sola Hi Lavo Tala, A Pfumala Na Kaya.
3. Ndzi Byele Hi Xihambano, La Vambiweke Kona, A Va Ni Gome Rikulu, Na Ta Sirha Ra Yena;
Rirhandzu Leri Ronghasi, A Ri Ndzi Funengete, Ri Tshama Ri Ndzi Tsundzuxa, Ku Kutsuriwa Kanga.
